trends: There have been 18 other sightings in Monterey
There was one other sighting in Monterey on or around September 14th 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsWas in monterey sep. 14 and 15 there were lights that changed colors and didn't move for over an hour the second day it stayed in same area for a few hours . We saw somthing similar to this sep.5 over the bay. So we pulled out the phone and got these lights on video
Summary: 2nights in a row this object just stayed n the same are for over an hour so i was able to get video
